DescriptionData.Title: Diamond FX Essential Face Paint - Blue (90 gm)
DescriptionData.Description:
Diamond FX Essential Blue Face Paint is a strongly pigmented water-based professional face paint. Renders lively colors and provides solid coverage that lasts all day without fading or cracking. Diamond FX maintains brightness and density even when painted over other colors. Diamond FX Essential is ideal for blending, layering or line work. Requires only a small amount of water. Hypo-allergenic and non-toxic; free of perfumes.
Diamond FX is manufactured according to the EEC and FDA regulations. Tested in the Netherlands. FDA does not recommend using reds and blues (this includes greens and purples) around the eye and lip area or leaving them on the skin for long. Avoid contact with upholstery, fabric and carpets.
Comes in 90 gm stackable container. 90 gm containers can be screwed together for easy storage.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Strongly pigmented water-based face paint that is perfect for line work, blending or layering.
Provides superb, opaque coverage that lasts all day without fading or cracking.
Perfect for creating dolphin, sea, sky or winter designs.
Easy to apply either with a sponge or a brush. Removes easily with soap and water.
Each 3.17 ounces (90 gm) stackable container is good for 250-1,000 applications.

DescriptionData.Title: Diamond FX Neon Face Paint - White (45 gm)
DescriptionData.Description:
Diamond FX Neon White looks normal under daylight but glows intensely under black light. Great for night events, clubs and parties where black light is very trendy these days. Diamond FX Neon Face Paint is a strongly pigmented water-based face paint that gives great coverage that lasts all day without cracking or fading. Works great with minimal amount of water. Perfume-free and gentle on skin. Maintains density and brightness even when applied over other colors.
Tested in the Netherlands. Diamond FX Neon White contains ingredients that have been approved by the FDA to be used in cosmetics and hence have relatively less black light effect than other colors. Diamond FX Neon Colors are not recommended for use around lips and eyes. Avoid contact with upholstery, carpets and fabric.
Comes in 45 gm stackable container. 45 gm containers can be screwed together for easy storage.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Strongly pigmented water-based face paint that creates glowing effects under black light.
Perfect for night clubs and parties where black light is very popular these days.
Not recommended for use around eyes and lips.
Easy to apply either with a sponge or a brush. Removes easily with soap and water.
Each 1.59 ounces (45 gm) stackable container is good for 100-250 applications.

DescriptionData.Title: Diamond FX Metallic Face Paint - Blue (90 gm)
DescriptionData.Description:
Diamond FX Metallic Blue Face Paint is a strongly pigmented water-based face paint that adds a metallic sheen to your designs. Works well with minimal amount of water. Diamond FX Metallic Face Paint provides great coverage that lasts all day without cracking or fading. Perfume-free and gentle on skin. Perfect for line work. Maintains brightness and density even when painted over other colors.
Diamond FX is manufactured according to the EEC and FDA regulations. Tested in the Netherlands. FDA does not recommend using reds and blues (this includes greens and purples) around the eye and lip area or leaving them on the skin for long. Avoid contact with upholstery, fabric and carpets.
Comes in 90 gm stackable container. 90 gm containers can be screwed together for easy storage.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Strongly pigmented water-based face paint that adds a metallic sheen to your designs.
Provides superb, opaque coverage that lasts all day without fading or cracking.
Ideal for underwater, sky, winter or sea designs.
Easy to apply either with a sponge or a brush. Removes easily with soap and water.
Each 3.17 ounces (90 gm) stackable container is good for 250-1,000 applications.

DescriptionData.Title: Diamond FX Essential Face Paint - Purple (90 gm)
DescriptionData.Description:
Diamond FX Essential Purple Face Paint is a strongly pigmented water-based professional face paint. Renders lively colors and provides solid coverage that lasts all day without fading or cracking. Diamond FX maintains brightness and density even when painted over other colors. Diamond FX Essential is ideal for blending, layering or line work. Requires only a small amount of water. Hypo-allergenic and non-toxic; free of perfumes.
Diamond FX is manufactured according to the EEC and FDA regulations. Tested in the Netherlands. FDA does not recommend using reds and blues (this includes greens and purples) around the eye and lip area or leaving them on the skin for long. Avoid contact with upholstery, fabric and carpets.
Comes in 90 gm stackable container. 90 gm containers can be screwed together for easy storage.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Strongly pigmented water-based face paint that is perfect for line work, blending or layering.
Provides superb, opaque coverage that lasts all day without fading or cracking.
Works great for creating pretty masks, fairies and butterflies.
Easy to apply either with a sponge or a brush. Removes easily with soap and water.
Each 3.17 ounces (90 gm) stackable container is good for 250-1,000 applications.

Insert with 12 holes
Fits 32 gm TAG Body Art Colors

DescriptionData.Title: Diamond FX Neon Face Paint - Green (90 gm)
DescriptionData.Description:
Diamond FX Neon Green looks bright under daylight but glows intensely under black light. Great for night events, clubs and parties where black light is very trendy these days. Diamond FX Neon Face Paint is a strongly pigmented water-based face paint that gives great coverage that lasts all day without cracking or fading. Works great with minimal amount of water. Perfume-free and gentle on skin. Maintains density and brightness even when applied over other colors.
Tested in the Netherlands. Diamond FX Neon Green contains certain neon pigments that haven't been tested by the FDA, and is therefore labeled for use on hair and special effects only, and not a cosmetic. Diamond FX Neon Colors are not recommended for use around lips and eyes. Avoid contact with upholstery, carpets and fabric.
Comes in 90 gm stackable container. 90 gm containers can be screwed together for easy storage.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Strongly pigmented water-based face paint that creates glowing effects under black light.
Perfect for night clubs and parties where black light is very popular these days.
Not recommended for use around eyes and lips.
Easy to apply either with a sponge or a brush. Removes easily with soap and water.
Each 3.17 ounces (90 gm) stackable container is good for 250-1,000 applications.

DescriptionData.Title: Diamond FX Neon Face Paint - Blue (90 gm)
DescriptionData.Description:
Diamond FX Neon Blue looks normal under daylight but glows intensely under black light. Great for night events, clubs and parties where black light is very trendy these days. Diamond FX Neon Face Paint is a strongly pigmented water-based face paint that gives great coverage that lasts all day without cracking or fading. Works great with minimal amount of water. Perfume-free and gentle on skin. Maintains density and brightness even when applied over other colors.
Tested in the Netherlands. Diamond FX Neon Blue contains ingredients that have been approved by the FDA to be used in cosmetics and hence have relatively less black light effect than other colors. Diamond FX Neon Colors are not recommended for use around lips and eyes. Avoid contact with upholstery, carpets and fabric.
Comes in 90 gm stackable container. 90 gm containers can be screwed together for easy storage.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Strongly pigmented water-based face paint that creates glowing effects under black light.
Perfect for night clubs and parties where black light is very popular these days.
Not recommended for use around eyes and lips.
Easy to apply either with a sponge or a brush. Removes easily with soap and water.
Each 3.17 ounces (90 gm) stackable container is good for 250-1,000 applications.

DescriptionData.Title: Diamond FX 6 Color Palette - Regular (10 gm)
DescriptionData.Description:
Diamond FX 6 Color Palette includes strongly pigmented water-based face paint in 6 colors, 10 gm each. 10 gm palettes are easily refillable. Colors included are: Yellow, Green, Black, White, Red and Purple. Diamond FX 6 Color palette also comes with a #3 Round Brush and a #2 Flat Brush.
Diamond FX Face Paint gives superior opaque coverage that lasts all day without cracking or fading. Diamond FX maintains brightness and density even when painted over other colors. Diamond FX Essential is ideal for blending, layering or line work. Requires only a small amount of water. Hypo-allergenic and non-toxic; free of perfumes.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Includes high quality water-based face paint in 6 colors, 10 grams each.
Includes colors: Yellow, Green, Black, White, Red and Purple. Also includes a #3 Round Brush and a #2 Flat Brush.
FDA does not recommend using reds and blues (this includes greens and purples) around the eye and lip area or leaving on the skin too long.
Apply either with a sponge or a brush. Requires only a small amount of water. Removes easily with soap and water.
Perfect for line work, blending or layering.
